name: Planet Aqualuce
description:
Farming fun by Kim and Jonny

Thanks to winning the lottery, Pip and Yōki got the chance to travel to a distant planet. It was a one-way flight but that doesnt matter! There is plenty of nutritious turf to furtilise on the small planet, so the duo quickly agreed on a mission: "Grow a fortune, become rich!"

Sadly they got no clue what to do, so  you'll have to signal them where to go, where to stay still and more. 

Pip responds to buttoninputs on WASD + F, 

Yōki responds to pressing the Arrowkeys + rightControl

Every plant needs Light and water, even on this planet. Pip glued a bunch of Lightbulbs on his cap, while Yōki decided to wear sponges as shoes. Sadly sponges dont store water forever, so Yōki will have to visit some body of water, mabye a frozen pond or a frozen lake,  frequently.

The snek-mafia quickly quickly noticed Pip and Yōkis activity on planet Aqualuce, so they dug a hole into the wall of their house, and call it a "SHOP".
If either Pip or Yōki talk to a snek-mafia rookie, it will offer them a carrot seed.
If you dont wanna plant carrots all day long, debate with the Snek-mafia rookie by pressing left or right. 

Here is a not very helpful graph that shows you, how the snek-mafia claims, these plants would behave.

PlantWaterLightTimeCategoryCarrotsomesomenot muchCropStarefruitsomemuchmuchCropCowlyFlowermuchsomevery muchFlowerWiggleshroomsvery muchnonemuchFlowerPantplantnot muchmuchvery muchCropBoomBloommuchnot muchsomeFlowerPowerFlowernonevery muchnot muchFlowerMelonyvery muchsomemuchCropOceanconenonesomevery, very muchBushB.U.S.Hsomenonevery, very muchBush

If the plants are done with growing, they should be harvested and sold to commeowters. Those fly by at rapid speed, checking out whats for sale. If they find something, they transfer the money to your virtual Toki-coin account. They are quite the hectic beings, better not walk into their flight-path
